title: FS T222 1914 Fatima Magee, Lobert and more Large Price Drop
author: JamesGallo

posts.post_title: FS T222 1914 Fatima Magee, Lobert and more Large Price Drop
posts.post_content:
I just got these back from SGC.  Both cards have a slight trim to the bottom edge but have a VG ish appearence.  Both are short prints with each only having 12 total cards graded by both companies.  Very tough cards.

Hans Lobert SGC Authentic  A few light creases to the corners, but nothing to bad.  Minor stains on back $500 NOW $350
[IMG]http://www.thetoyheaven.com/images/items/baseballcards/bbct222lobert.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.thetoyheaven.com/images/items/baseballcards/bbct222lobertbk.jpg[/IMG]

Sherry Magee SGC Authentic  Lower left and upper right corners have light creases but very nice otherwise.  Off center.  Super clean back. $1000 NOW $600
[IMG]http://www.thetoyheaven.com/images/items/baseballcards/bbct222magee.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.thetoyheaven.com/images/items/baseballcards/bbct222mageebk.jpg[/IMG]

Red Murray SGC Auth Slight trim, couple small creases by the feet,  but very clean otherwise. $150 Now $100

[IMG]http://www.thetoyheaven.com/images/items/baseballcards/bbct222murray.jpg[/IMG]



Bullet Joe Bush SGC 10, a few creases and a 2 inch tear to right edge.  There was a small piece of tape on the back that I cleanly peeled off with no problems. $150 NOW $125

[IMG]http://www.thetoyheaven.com/images/items/baseballcards/bbct222bush.jpg[/IMG]



Shipping is included insurance is on the buyer.  Paypal is fine and first to say they want it gets it.

Email is [url]jgallony@aol.com[/url]

Thanks

James G

Bump, feel free to make cash or trade offers.
